text.1_Chapter, 2_Verse, 4_Comment: For out of Zion â€“ Because the true Torah is that which comes out of Zion. There is no other in the world.
text.53_Chapter, 10_Verse, 0_Comment: This was said about Jerusalem, that she is like a poor afflicted one shivering as if from a storm wind and there is no one to console her
